website_summaries.verdict: A sound choice for those who are new to WBV workouts and aren't too heavy.
pros: Basic model that's lightweight and easy to carry at 35 lbs
Comes with support bars and operates by remote control
cons: say it feels like it will buckle under their weight

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I've used it almost every day since it arrived. It definitely strengthened my core and firmed my thighs and glutes. I have more energy and sleeping better. My lower back pain has disappeared as well
customer_reviews.author: nabd

customer_reviews.title: Very well made product for the price. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product for the price. I have more than 35 years experience in sportsmedicine and fitness industry. Research showing positive results from oscillation platforms is compelling. Of course, one actually has to USE it to get results. Don't be a fitness closet person. Keep this out where you can conveniently get on it multiple times per day for 3-5 minutes of squats, toe raises, etc., done with very slow movements. Hold squats at 90 degree knee position - you will feel your muscles responding. Improves balance, too. Make sure to have a handhold within reach and/or use canes, crutches or walking sticks to aid balance if you are unsteady.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic..
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic...im limited physically and all 3 of my Drs. Are very happy with my using your product. .several friends are also purchasing one too after a quick giggle on mine highly recommend it..I can use it even though I have vertigo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: I mainly bought this for my father who has complicated issues with his knee after an accident which he has not had any feeling and after a while of continuous use of this equipment he has regained feeling and motion he hasn't felt for over 42 years
customer_reviews.author: GreenKing

customer_reviews.title: What a ride!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today and I'm already in love with it! It's pretty heavy, when you get the machine positioned and get on its pretty awesome. You have to give it a minute to get the rhythm down its really working you can feel the burn, and when you are done you feel invigorated. I'll write another review in a couple weeks to share results. Excited! Working out can be fun!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ortez

customer_reviews.title: I recommend spending a little extra money and purchasing a 500 ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. I recommend spending a little extra money and purchasing a 500 watt motor. Huge difference. Because it is cheaply made the truth is that this product comes with a 3 month warranty so don't trust the reviews as it's likely to crap out shortly after . You can purchase a better unit with a better motor with a 2 year warranty for about the same price. Do your research before purchasing. This machine is a piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Side to side shaking hurts hips.
customer_reviews.text: Shakes horizontally and makes your hip sockets hurt. Need linear or vertical vibration machine which shakes up and down not side to side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this machine
customer_reviews.text: I like this machine. I have a number of exercise machines & I find that this vibration plate greatly improved my circulation.
customer_reviews.author: D Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Died after 2 uses. Not 3D. Nowhere near the stated mhz / rpm. Meh.
customer_reviews.text: A huge dissapointment -- I REALLY needed it for PT. Sadly, it *appears* to be well built -- until you use it. Worked semi-correctly twice. Today all it did was shake violently, then quit in under a minute. (Yes, I checked the plug.) At best I could get it to work intermittently. Meh. Worse, it's not 3D, and doesn't vibrate anywhere near the stated rpm. Maybe I just got a lemon, but I won't bother with Hurtle products again-- just on the basis of false advertising wrt the 3D.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is helping my special needs daughter tremendously. It helps calm her down
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Defective?
customer_reviews.text: After comparing this machine to the one my girlfriend got, I noticed that mine looks and functions very different. Mine goes to level 99. The pictures I attached show the differences between our units. Im not sure what unit I got, but I can be very sure that it's not the same one that my girlfriend got. Please advise which unit is correct so she knows if she needs to send hers back as well. I did look at reviews from others and they all seem to have the same sticker markings as hers. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: my back and legs neck HURT SO BAD..NOW I AM PAIN FREE
customer_reviews.text: I Can't stay off of it! Sitting at my desk all day, my back and legs neck HURT SO BAD... In just one 15 min( on low )the pain was virtually gone. Every time i start to hurt i just get on and stretch. It arrived early not just on time. No problems getting started. Good Quality
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: IT'S NOT UL CERTIFIED / RATED
customer_reviews.text: The only bad thing is that the Hurtle Fitness Vibration Platform Workout Machine is NOT UL certified/rated, which means the product hasn't received safety certification. I vaguely smelled something like burned rubber when using it for longer than a couple of minutes. After that, I unplugged the machine and requested a refund, which I received. Remember, SAFETY first! Be careful and don't cause a fire by accident or because equipment malfunction.
customer_reviews.author: Mila Werner

customer_reviews.title: Instructions suck!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to strengthen my core, improve balance, etc., and it might well do all of those things, however the instructions are awful - how does on "...undress watch.." and what does 'reposeful' mean? It does not tell one that batteries are required, it doesn't clearly state how to turn it on even. The machine itself seems sturdy, it's noisy and it has all sorts of different vibrations, thumps, bumps and jiggles, which I guess is what it's suppose to do. I have yet to figure out how to do more than one setting, but have hopes trial and error will work. Whoever wrote the instructions should do something they are good at - like maybe cleaning toilets.
customer_reviews.author: hola

customer_reviews.title: Not good for an 80 plus year old
customer_reviews.text: Not good for an 80 plus year old. Need really good balance and not arthritic hips and knees. I believe it would be wonderful to start using earlier in life and surely would be beneficial to the body.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Heuer

customer_reviews.title: Way too ROUGH on Level 1! Returning!
customer_reviews.text: I wish someone had told me how ROUGH this one was. I would never have purchased it. I wanted gentle machine that would be safe for my joint issues....this one is extremely rough compared to my sister's brand.. and that is on LEVEL 1! Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: More like it was unbalanced
customer_reviews.text: Very harsh vibration. More like it was unbalanced. Not sure if the one I bought was defective or if it's just a poor quality vibration platform. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Quite impressed so far. Not just vibration but the oscillating movement and vibration really give you a good workout. Well made/solid framework. Hopefully it lasts but after 10 or so uses it seems solid and well made. Some rattling when the straps are attached but not being used, but that's to be expected. I do wish there were more instructions and/or pictures pertaining to what positions to take to work out specific parts of the body, but I guess a little common sense and experimentation will help figure that out. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Hooser

customer_reviews.title: I use this to improve my circulation and help tone some muscles.
customer_reviews.text: I like the shaking/vibration modes that this machine gives me. It's exhilarating and energizing. Due to RA and Osteoarthritis I have not been actively exercising much before purchasing it. I have only used it consistently everyday for 10 min intervals twice a day for the past 2 weeks and now I'm starting to feel stronger & better, with less pains and soreness each time. It's improving my circulation, my mobility, and my mental attitude. I'm calmer, more relaxed after each session with this machine. I am happy that I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Works for toning your lower body only if you stay consistent!
customer_reviews.text: I basically use this machine every morning and every night! It definitely feels like it’s working my glutes and thighs! I’ve noticed less cellulite around my thighs. My only issue is that it shuts off after 10 minutes when I’d like to go 15 minutes, but I just flip it back on. I do want to note that there’s no way this machine can burn 4,000 calories in its display ad on here, that’s a complete lie to sell the product.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this and it works just as great as the one in salon where I was going to for lipolight. This machine is actually better because you have the ability to get into more positions to make each session more effective.
customer_reviews.author: victoria L

customer_reviews.title: Great product for sore muscles.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. A friend at CrossFit told me that it was good using while stretching. It is fabulous. Also, very relaxing to lay on it, or to loosen up calf muscles and quads. I use it while watching TV with my feet up on it for a nice massage feeling. My daughter is using it to tone her body and loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Taras K

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy my machine but can be a bit noisy.
customer_reviews.text: I have had an ankle injury and it took a long time to recover. I used a vibro plate at the gym and decided I wanted to try one at home. It is supposed to help with circulation and help tone muscles and be good for injuries. I do notice a small change in my overall toning. You cannot use this alone and expect results so, I workout and after my workout use for 10-15 mins. It seems to help me achieve faster results. I am a bit disappointed because I recently moved into an upstairs apartment and the plate vibrates and shakes the floor so much I am worried my neighbors will start to complain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had known of this product sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this equipment because a friend of mine recommended it! What an incredible investment. I love this machine. It is so convenient, just plug in and go. I do 10 minutes in the highest setting. I love everything about it but what I like the most is that in 2 weeks I am already seeing results, my husband made the observation yesterday. I am toning and my side fatty bags are melting away. Whooohooo!❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately, Amazon was kind enough to help me get ...
customer_reviews.text: If you buy this product, make sure you get the extended warranty. The manufacturer only gives you 30 days, and, unfortunatley, the product only worked for 1 year and 4 months. Now, it doesn't even turn on. Amazon doesn't even have the manufacturer's contact information. Fortunately, Amazon was kind enough to help me get a new machine with just a restocking fee.
customer_reviews.author: Diomaris Contreras

customer_reviews.title: health benefits beyond simple exercise
customer_reviews.text: this is the best tech gadget I've ever purchased. within minutes of use I could feel it opening up my lymph...the edema in my legs starting to clear. it also made me feel better right away and cleared my head.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: I received the vibration platform in good time and the packing was very well done. All parts were present and all work very well. Having just received it this week, I have used it only three times so I can't report any impact as yet; however, I am sore in several areas so there definitely is an effect. I am 72 years old with some joint issues that preclude many forms of exercise, so hopefully the power plate will be an answer for me. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gresh

customer_reviews.title: COMPACT AND QUIET
customer_reviews.text: I've owned these platforms for many years and really love how it helps my circulation. This one I really like because it is compact, doesn't even show when it's in the living room, and is VERY quiet, not disturbing our TV watching. Great for varicose veins to promote circulation.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanniehyg

customer_reviews.title: Turtle Fitness Vibration Platform Workout Machine
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this to anyone. Bought this to help wife to help strengthen legs after injury and we both noticed a difference right away in range of motion, help with balance . I would advise someone being with the person who uses it bc of the steady vibration, but you can very easily switch off. It is a very good product and worth the money don't be fooled by price, but it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: VERY STURDY VIBRATOR UNIT, GREAT HEAVY DUTY APPEARANCE
customer_reviews.text: VERY EASY TO ASSEMBLE AND BEGIN OPERATION ONCE I LOCATED SOME AAA BATTERIES FOR THE REMOTE.. UNIT RECEIVED IN EXCELLENT PACKAGING, SAFE AND SOUND AND SIMPLE TO OPEN. MY PURCHASE OF A WHITE COVER WAS WISE AT IT IS NOW SO VERY ATTRACTIVE WHEREVER I CHOOSE TO USE IT. POWER IS NOT AS GREAT AS MOST OF THE MORE EXPENSIVE ONES BUT MORE THAN ADEQUATE FOR THIS 200 LB BODY. LOVE THE FEEL OF THE VIBRATIONS AND THE REMOTE CONTROL OF ALL FUNCTIONS.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Cowden

customer_reviews.title: No Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: I reached out to this vender via email request, on their website presence, within a couple of days after receiving the equipment; requesting that someone contacts me. No one ever followed-up with me. I made 2 more attempts. The last being yesterday; 9/14, still no response. The device started acting more crazy today. It is unacceptable, not to be able to return this equipment, that was purchased as 'new'; yet it performed as if it was refurbished. This was not a low dollar value purchase. I am extremely disturbed by this. The company needs to take responsibility for their actions; or lack, thereof.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Reed

customer_reviews.title: What a great find!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely satisfied with this equipment. If properly taken care of, it should last a long time. It is a fact that you feel like you have been working out in the gym. I walk every day with my dogs. But I wanted to add a little more to my daily workout activities. I am soon to be 72 and this equipment is a wonderful find for me. Thank you PyleUSA. When ordering this product make sure you order the book for all excercises.
customer_reviews.author: scorpio

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Wife wanted this for christmas, so i got it for her. She likes it and uses it often. my daughter likes to stand on it as well, probably because it vibrates her small body, making her giggle. product is a bit heavy. definitely do not lift it by yourself like i did (there was a warning on the package and in the manual that it would be heavy). overall, great purchase. stable, sturdy, though you can definitely hear it from down the hall. only time will tell if it works out for the wife, or not.
customer_reviews.author: Bingojubes

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this vibration platform!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this vibration platform! It has performed beyond my expectations. I love the fact that I can use the pre-set programs or use manual mode. The power of this platform works every muscle group. The pre-set programs run you through interval training which is awesome. I definitely feel it working. I use it twice a day and I have noticed an improvement in my low back pain, sleep and energy! I HIGHLY recommend this vibration platform.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Very good small machine for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had long but really like it so far. I have larger machine at home so bought this for my second home. I really believe it helps me keep up my strength and balance. Need to get a list of exercises if you want to effectively use vibra therapy.
customer_reviews.author: Gramy of five

customer_reviews.title: great choice
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this vibration machine. I have used the very expensive model before but find this one to be more than adequate. It's easy, fun, feels GREAT, takes up little space, very sturdy. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: D Adams

customer_reviews.title: I used it right away after i received it last Thursday & really enjoy using the vibration platform workout
customer_reviews.text: Yes! I used it right away after i received it last Thursday & really enjoy using the vibration platform workout, it helps with my whole body for blood circulation especially for my frozen shoulder. I can do my own therapy at home without going to my physical therapy treatment.
customer_reviews.author: E. Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable lovely machine
customer_reviews.text: Well priced Vibrating Plate machine. I have been using for a week now and I can start to feel a tightening of the muscles in my calves and thighs. The only "complaint" I have is that the "M" button on my remote doesn't do anything. According to manual it's supposed to be a "quick" button to levels 6, 16, and 60, but mine just beeps and does nothing to machine. I'm not sure if it's a defective remote or poorly written manual instructions. Overall, I LOVE this machine. Quick and easy "work out."
customer_reviews.author: RoGard

customer_reviews.title: Feeling The Burn!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very sturdy, well built & worth every penny. I'm a person who doesn't like to be lied to & I was very sceptical about buying a product I had no knowledge of, but I became a believer after the first day. After only 10min, I got off & I could feel the difference immediately in my core.
customer_reviews.author: jharda02

customer_reviews.title: That itself is great! I am hoping that it helps to tone ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this every day for 3 weeks and don't see any difference in body tone. What I have found that using this machine every day my hips and knees don't hurt at night when I am trying to sleep. That itself is great! I am hoping that it helps to tone up the rest of my body and to start to notice it soon.
customer_reviews.author: lws

customer_reviews.title: Alleviates Knee Pain
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It works wonders to help alleviate my knee pains and notice a difference in circulation as well. I had my elderly mom try it out (sitting down) and she loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Aliaswoman

customer_reviews.title: this is a fun machine. it's great for lazy people who want ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a fun machine. it's great for lazy people who want to multi task but still get some exercise. obviously it doesnt equate to actually walking or running outside. but this has helped me lose weight (while eating clean).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer!

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've been on much better vibration machines. This one is very weak.,even on the highest setting.
customer_reviews.author: mimi bean

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in overall product quality. Item did not perform as advertised. I suspect I should have ordered a more expensive model.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN C. KEY MD

customer_reviews.title: Shakes the *^$#! out of you if that's what you're looking for
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says it will do. Seems well made. It certainly is heavy. Getting an upper body "shake" is not as easy. I hope this thing isn't messing up my joints! I hate exercise, so if this works..... I guess time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Chas. M.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful home exercise solution
customer_reviews.text: This machine is really fabulous for waking up every muscle in your body instantly. 10-15 minutes is all you need and you feel recharged and energized for the day. It's super convenient, I use it in living room while watching the morning weather report then roll it into the nearest closet. I highly recommend this little gift to your self. ~S
customer_reviews.author: MsMorettisView

customer_reviews.title: The one where I almost became a pirate
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for 2 weeks and one of the straps busted and hit me in the face, knocking my glasses off and breaking them. Had I not been wearing glasses, it would have been a very unfortunate situation. Aside from nearly having to learn to accessorize my outfits with an eye patch, and unexpected expense of purchasing new prescription glasses, I have had no other issues with the product. I want to like it, but can't figure out how to reach the seller to get a replacement strap... preferably one that won't try to kill me🤣
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good machine but the lowest setting was too strong for me, a senior citizen, so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Concerns

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't feel powerful enough even though I'm only 5'3" and 132 lbs I feel like I slow it down
customer_reviews.text: It's okay but not very strong at only a level 20 at 30 htz. Doesn't feel powerful enough even though I'm only 5'3" and 132 lbs I feel like I slow it down. I'm going for a higher level- more power.
customer_reviews.author: Oyster800

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: Dislike that the 2nd time using this machine there was smoke coming out from underneath and now doesnt work.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: my husband and I love it
customer_reviews.text: I was going have knee surgery and I got this to try to save me from that. I want to say that it has helped me so much,I called the surgery off. Not only that, I have told my family and friends all about it. I should get commission on the ones they bought, buy
customer_reviews.author: SUZAN BACH

customer_reviews.title: I just received it and I loved it. It is very stable and has a ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received it and I loved it. It is very stable and has a very good vibration. I do not know if it serves for what it says but I think that because everything moves you all. I loved it and it came very fast
customer_reviews.author: yuli

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE my HURVBTR30
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my HURVBTR30! I have crippling arthritis and I can use this platform! I am so excited to be able to do a small workout again without pain.
customer_reviews.author: M.D. Heathers

customer_reviews.title: :) Super for us fit freaks
customer_reviews.text: Awesome piece of exercise equipment that will help you get off your booty and shake off some of that fat! It also helps to detox but naturally, you will have to do other forms of exercise for that cut goal. However, its compact size is ideal and I live in a 14' RV so you can imagine...
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ohara

customer_reviews.title: Company Not Responsive
customer_reviews.text: I am a senior citizen with back issues and cannot walk like I used to. I wrote to this company to ask for their recommendations for someone like me. Never got a response, hence my rating. I simply stand on it at the lowest setting and do feel like it does some good.
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I've used a professional one at my doctors office and was skeptical if this one would do as well but I honestly feel like this one works better! I use it everyday and so do my kids. It was a life saver when I hurt my back, 5 mins on this and I could stand straight again. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: brandy

customer_reviews.title: Defect
customer_reviews.text: Good evening. On the evening of 28.08.18 we received a parcel-Hurtle Fitness Vibration Platform Workout Machine. When used on the 5th minute, it smoke. A strong smoke went off and we turned it off. What should we do? Can we use it or can it be returned? Please reply us soroina_tania@ukr.net
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: So far I really like it, I am measuring and seeing if it ...
customer_reviews.text: Received product very quickly! So far I really like it, I am measuring and seeing if it truly does help! Easy to work out on! I watched video's so to know how to do things on it, the instruction booklet doesn't show alot! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: ROXANN A.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this. I’ve only had it about a week
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. I’ve only had it about a week .. have only iaws it a couple times but the female power cord receptacle has a open circuit & I have to wiggle it around to make connection. I plan to get ahold of the company as I’m sure they will stand by it
customer_reviews.author: Janell Nease

customer_reviews.title: Not as I expected
customer_reviews.text: I use a Vibrashake machine at the gym and thought this would be basically the same result. It isn't! I have severe dizziness that lasts for days every time I use it! I have used it 4 times and can no longer use it. It was a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Ann D.

customer_reviews.title: Quit Working
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my son who has autism. He loves vibrotactile feedback. It worked great at first, but stopped working a couple weeks later. Contacted the manufacturer’s customer service, but still haven’t received a response.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Brown

customer_reviews.title: Fingers crossed
customer_reviews.text: I like it so far, and the machine works thus far as far as it didn’t come broken. I haven’t used it as consistently as I need to be, but I am hopeful it helps my pain, circulation, my bones, and my lymphatic system (lipedima)
customer_reviews.author: Yuli

customer_reviews.title: Great way to tone up in 10 mins a day
customer_reviews.text: The machine was great. When it is on the motor is very quiet. I usually use it 20 minutes a day. 10 mins on my arms and 10 on my legs. It has given me more muscle definition without bulking me up. ASbsolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cherylbeth

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this machine for my father he is really happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine for my father he is really happy with it .he suffer from parkinson and i just recently went to see him and let me tell you something i see a big difference .he is more active and looks better.. is a great machine..
customer_reviews.author: Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I tried out something similar while I was in a store in HK and wanted to get one similar to it while I was back in the states. It was great while it worked but the one I received had an issue with the molding of the device on the plug where the plug would not stay in properly causing the device to keep turning on and off which could be a fire hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Vibration fitness
customer_reviews.text: Plug in right out of the box and get to work! It’s that easy! Simple to use, has basic exercises in manual but plenty more on you tube. Only had it for a few days so can’t tell if it does the job. Actually bought it for excercising my lower body since surgery last year limited my movement. Hoping that this will loosen me up and tone those muscles that were not being used.
customer_reviews.author: Kruiser

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Different modes don’t work consistently, and overall just a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy W.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I am an older person and bought this to help with bone mass and muscle strength. I am very happy with this machine! It's very easy to use and stores away well. After using it, my muscles feel that they have gotten a workout. I have started out on the lower settings but will be working my way up. It was well packed and came on time. I'm looking forward to seeing many positive results as time goes on!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Pressley

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it, my back was hurting I stand on ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it, my back was hurting I stand on this for 10 mins makes my back feel so much better. Plus I have lost some inches in my legs
customer_reviews.author: michelle medert

customer_reviews.title: I love this and use it every other day
customer_reviews.text: I love this and use it every other day!! So far has been awesome - I bought for circulatory reasons & have read that these machines really have a lot of benefit for that.
customer_reviews.author: smithathens

customer_reviews.title: Solid, stable, quiet operation
customer_reviews.text: This unit is very stable and powerful. The remote is user friendly and it operates quietly. I appreciate that it does not take up a great deal of space. It would be nice if the power cord was just a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Beware may hurt your knees
customer_reviews.text: I got this vibrating platform after read the review for pain relieve and body recovery, i use it for a week, once a day at the lower setting. Now i have terrible knee pain that i never had before. This thing hurts my knee.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Fun, it works like a massage
customer_reviews.text: It is fun. I don't think this can replace a good workout but I can tell you that if you sit a lot (in my case because of work), when you use it, it feels amazing! I just wished it came with suggested exercises. I mainly use it for 20 minutes daily. I put it over a mat because the vibrations were really strong and I didn't want to disturb my neighbors in the floor underneath me .
customer_reviews.author: Patty D S

customer_reviews.title: Good WBV platform with one big flaw
customer_reviews.text: I like the vibration, it's a rocking motion, no up and down, which makes it more portable/lighter. The big problem is the timer. The system cuts off after a maximum of ten minutes. You can't increase it. It's annoying. If I'd known how annoying this would have been, I would have chosen a different platform.
customer_reviews.author: cyberfinger

customer_reviews.title: Feels like expensive one in doctor's office
customer_reviews.text: I tried a similar product in the doctor's office and I have been looking for one ever since. I have used this 2 days in a row and I love it. I feel it working just like the expensive one in the doctor's office. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Lurae Zarbock

customer_reviews.title: Works great to relax, and restless leg syndrome.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine to help me with my restless leg syndrome, it works very well. I use it two a day and it night I lie on the floor and shake a leg or two. I love this machine! I don't give it a 5 star only because it doesn't seem to help with weight loss. I wasn't looking for that anyways but just so you know, I've lost nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Jones

customer_reviews.title: Effective!
customer_reviews.text: Convenient remote control with manual controls on the unit along with on/off button. Suctions on base for sturdy support and roller on one end so when lifted can easily be moved. Videos on effective exercises available on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: DoveCafe07

customer_reviews.title: and it has not disappointed. As good if not better than the one ...
customer_reviews.text: Saw one of these at an expensive massage chair store but was hesitant to pull the trigger based on the cost. But upon looking around on Amazon I decided to try this one, and it has not disappointed. As good if not better than the one I saw for at the store for 3x what I bought this one for.
customer_reviews.author: shadowgummy

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Not as strong as the big ones but it gets the job done. You do not lose lbs on these so if you are buying it for that, don’t! It helped a Collegiate Volleyball Player, get lose from daily training and hard game play. Small and easy to move. Was in a dorm room and it didn’t take up much room. It is quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Lora Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I was in love with machine but my back I was in such pain along with my sciatica I chose to use another therapeutic method. I do think it's a good product but it just didn't work for me
customer_reviews.author: Hank K.

customer_reviews.title: absolutely love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have a huge energy boost every time I use this! I have only been doing 10 minutes on level 1. I feel great, have an increase in energy and I feel like I have a huge increase in circulation. I over did it one day and it made me slightly nauseas so I recommend that you increase slowly!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Toned and Fabulous!!!
customer_reviews.text: My vibration platform arrived in good condition and on time. It is easy to use and I think I can already tell a difference after using it for a week. My muscles haven't gotten any bigger, but my body looks more toned. I am pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: TexasMom

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: After reading about vibrating machines being good for back pain, I decided to give it a try for my lower back. I've only had the equipment for a few days, but I have already noticed an improvement on my lower back pain. It also gives you a great ab workout. I'm still exploring its potential - stay tune.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! Only 2 weeks using it, so too soon to see results, but it is easy to use! The only thing I haven't understood from the instructions booklet is how to change default time from 10 to 15 mins! Will keep on trying! Also I would have liked a more specific types of exercises to do on it!
customer_reviews.author: Janice C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use and I had a lot of energy after just 10 minutes of use. It overall made me feel better emotionally and physically. I don't really write reviews but I wanted to let everyone know about this one.
customer_reviews.author: FELICIA

customer_reviews.title: Count the cost of 10 MINUTES for a Stronger and Healthier Body
customer_reviews.text: This product is great as John the Baptist. Definitely a forerunner to other exercise at the least cost of 10 minutes of your time. WOW, It's a workout you feel instantly. I just got it today, first using the stand upright position and that alone was felt in my entire body. I plan to use to most is not all recommended methods for support of a stronger and healthier body. Carl, Garland, TX
customer_reviews.author: Mary Warren

customer_reviews.title: My daughter (17) and I (older) love to supplement our fitness with this vibration plate and ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (17) and I (older) love to supplement our fitness with this vibration plate and feeling the benefits after two weeks. Great to warm up and warm down before/ after tennis matches. My daughter enjoys a full cardio workout every second day.
customer_reviews.author: Firefly

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in great shape. The oscillating motion is a bit rougher ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great shape. The oscillating motion is a bit rougher than I'm used to on other machines, however it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Rhodes-Elken

customer_reviews.title: Good Unit
customer_reviews.text: Top quality. Heavy (as it should be) but quite portable. Took it in the RV for the weekend. worked great. Quality and functionality is comparable to our professional Power Step unit (currently $600 used on Ebay). Very pleased with the unit.If you want to shake up your lymph system this seems like a good way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Mister E

customer_reviews.title: Ugh, Ok, wish i could return it
customer_reviews.text: This product is just okay, the remote be messing with the TV, my legs be feeling some type of way when I get done, just think before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: orville sharp

customer_reviews.title: Great workout for legs and arms!
customer_reviews.text: An amazing machine. Runs very quiet and leaves legs tingling in a good way. It has definitely has helped my restless legs at night. ♥
customer_reviews.author: Robbin

customer_reviews.title: Seen some knee pain improvement
customer_reviews.text: It is good exercising and my mom has had some pain relief from her knees, but it would b good if they included some exercise routines for this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Keylin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: My wife spotted a competitors product at the New York State Fair. It was way, way over priced. This does the same at a fraction of the cost. She's been using it and loves it! It's pretty solidly built. We'll see how it hold up and lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lefler

customer_reviews.title: We like ours a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Solid product. Made my back hurt for quite a while, but I'm 46 and don't exercise much at all. Over time, I think this will be a great addition to an exercise routine.
customer_reviews.author: Apple Worm

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Really noticed tightening of the skin. Helped also with weight loss, and head ache,and warms up my muscles in the morning. I’ve been doing morning and night consistently and saw results.
customer_reviews.author: tanya

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: So far impressed! Too soon to to know if it's going to make a difference or not but I'm confident it will .My muscles feel tired just after using it twice in one day.
customer_reviews.author: Chantelle Toscano

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with one of these. This machine seems very solidly built. It is easy to figure out how to work it. I does what I expected it to do.
customer_reviews.author: James A

customer_reviews.title: Vibration platform was recommended by my sibling
customer_reviews.text: Vibration platform was recommended by my sibling. only used it for about 1 week now. loving it so far. Yet to experience all the benefits that other rave about. Easy set up and instructions very simple.
customer_reviews.author: Eno Ikoku

customer_reviews.title: Bought one for me & Mom!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Love the floor suction cups on and the handles make it easy to move from place to place. I liked it so much that I bought another one for my mother!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Slight issue, resolved immediately
customer_reviews.text: The Hurtle arrived quickly but did not work. None of the button selections lit up or responded. I emailed for help and received immediate assistance. I returned the machine and was reimbursed within two days. I reordered the machine, and it works great! Overall, very good experience! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Hurtle Fitness Vibration Platform Workout Machine | Exercise Equipment For Home | Vibration Plate | Balance Your Weight Workout Equipment Includes, Remote Control & Balance Straps Included (HURVBTR30)
product_meta.description: Hurtle Model : HURVBTR30Vibration Fitness Exercise MachineStanding Vibration Fitness Machine - Vibrating Platform Exercise Workout Sports Trainer Features:Revolutionary Design for Fitness that's FunVibration Assisted Exercise for Full Body TrainingExcellent Toning for Abs, Thighs & ButtocksDynamic Oscillating Motion TechnologyHigh-Powered Vibrations do the Hard WorkAccelerated Fat Burning & Weight LossIncorporates Upper Body, Lower Body & Core WorkoutsLab Tested to Improve Muscle Strength, Flexibility & CirculationDetachable Handheld Resistance Bands for More Versatile RoutinesReduce Appearance of Cellulite, Improves Metabolic RatesSimple Operation: Stand On & Power OnIdeal for All Body Types & Age Groups(20) Level Adjustable SpeedsDigital Touch Button ControlsRubber Grip 'Anti-Slip' Surface PadPerfect for Sports Training, Weight Loss, Burning FatWhat's in the Box:Vibration Exercise MachineDetachable Arm Resistance BandsRemote ControlTechnical Specs:High Power Output: 200 WattRPM (Revolutions Per Minute): 2300+Construction Material: Engineered ABSMaximum Session Time Setting: 10 MinuteLoad Capacity: 265 lbs.Battery Operated Remote Control, Requires (2) x 'AAA' BatteriesPower Supply: 120VDimensions (L x W x H): 26.8'' x 15.5'' x 5.5'' -inchesThe Hurtle Vibrating Fitness Platform provides you with a new and exciting way to train! Take your fitness to the next level with vibration-assisted workouts that target your entire body. The revolutionary design allows you to tone your abs, thighs, buttocks, calves and more -- you will have the ability to focus on more areas of your body while incorporating a wide-range of different workouts! Next-generation dynamic oscillating motion technology uses high-powered vibrations that do the hard work and help you feel the burn. The system is easy to operate and simply requires you to step on! Incorporate upper body, lower body and core workouts which also aid in reducing the appearance of cellulite and improve metabolic rates. It's perfect for athletes and sports training, or anyone looking to accelerate weight loss and burn fat. Improve muscle strength, flexibility and circulation with the Hurtle Vibrating Exercise & Fitness Platform.
feature_bullets: IMPROVE FITNESS & FLEXIBILITY: The Hurtle Vibration Platform Trainer features a revolutionary design for fitness that’s fun - Vibrating exercise machine style for full body sports training
HOME GYM EXERCISE: Introduce next-generation sports gym training in the comfort of your own home with simple electric plug-in operation - Vibration exercise stimulates your muscles while training
LOSE WEIGHT & BURN FAT: Benefits from vibration exercise go far beyond building muscle, you will also enjoy boosting metabolism, improving circulation and building core strength simultaneously

VIBRATING PLATFORM: Dynamic oscillating motion technology allows whole body vibration for full body fitness & strength training - Lab tested exercise machine also helps reduce the appearance of cellulite

ABS, THIGHS & BUTTOCKS: Target the entire body with the high-powered vibration motor providing over 2300+ revolutions per minute - Includes detachable handheld resistance bands for arm and upper body exercises
